## Source: amazon-inspector (5339c05fd7459125a98a0503401e5eb8bca30c456d9a80f14485484df6256850)
The package ing-feat-malware-detection was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (e00c19d51e9dd73bbb1df2c336cc44359c873a9dd27b0888b512b9c6b255cdf0)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'ing-feat-malware-detection' @ 99.99.99 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
